section.title: Creating MAC Address Pools
section.para: You can create new MAC address pools.

step.para: On the header bar, click the Configure button to open the Configure window.
Click the MAC Address Pools tab.
Click the Add button to open the New MAC Address Pool window.

figure.title: The New MAC Address Pool Window

step.para: Enter the Name and Description of the new MAC address pool.

Select the Allow Duplicates check box to allow a MAC address to be used multiple times in a pool. The MAC address pool will not automatically use a duplicate MAC address, but enabling the duplicates option means a user can manually use a duplicate MAC address.

note.para: If one MAC address pool has duplicates disabled, and another has duplicates enabled, each MAC address can be used once in the pool with duplicates disabled but can be used multiple times in the pool with duplicates enabled.

step.para: Enter the required MAC Address Ranges. To enter multiple ranges click the plus button next to the From and To fields.
